description_top: Sefer Mitsṿot Ḳaṭan (The Small Book of Commandments)
title: Sefer Mitsṿot Ḳaṭan (The Small Book of Commandments)
author: Isaac ben Joseph, of Corbeil
description: Contains marginal texts: Samson ben Zadok, Tashbets (ff. 2r-77r). Jacob of Marvège, Sheʾelot u-teshuvot min ha-shamayim (ff. 77r-87v). Meir ben Baruch of Rothenburg, Berakhot Maharam (ff. 88r-101r).  Pesuḳe nidah (ff. 101v-109v).
